summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated April 3, 2011. The email discusses the confidentiality of the communication and suggests that the information may be privileged. It emphasizes the prohibition against unauthorized use or disclosure of the content.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing confidential information with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes the confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege of the communication.
It warns against unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying of the email content.
The email was sent on April 3, 2011.
